DOC.HEADLINE: PROSECUTOR SAYS GERMAN CARVED SWASTIKA HERSELF
DOC.TEXT: A wheelchair-bound German schoolgirl who caused a public outcry with a story that skinheads carved a swastika on her cheek probably did_it herself , a prosecutor said Friday . Public prosecutor Juergen Hossfeld said the investigation showed that the 17-year-old girl apparently was lying when she said three skinheads had cut her for refusing to shout Nazi slogans . German radio said the girl and her parents had disappeared from the east_German city of Halle on Thursday , three days after the alleged attack , which was denounced by German leaders and even drew condemnation from the Vatican . The prosecutor said doubts were raised early in the search because no suspects and no witnesses could be found despite a hunt by more_than 100 policemen .
